entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
